title: How to Make Crispy Pili

steps.headline: Boil water in a saucepan.
steps.description: Bring the water to a full boil.

steps.headline: Add the Pili nuts to the boiling water.
steps.description: When the skin of the Pili nuts starts to peel off, stop the cooking process.

steps.headline: Remove all of the Pili from the water.
Remove the skins from the nuts.
Add vegetable oil to a clean saucepan.
Fry the Pili nuts.
steps.description: Be sure to constantly stir the nuts while frying.

steps.headline: Add sugar when the Pili nuts are golden brown.
Caramelize the sugar.
steps.description: Allow the caramelized sugar to coat the nuts.

steps.headline: Remove the Pili nuts from the heat.
steps.description: Be sure they're coated in the caramelized sugar evenly and thoroughly!

text: Preparing the Pili Nuts Boil water in a saucepan. Bring the water to a full boil. Add the Pili nuts to the boiling water. When the skin of the Pili nuts starts to peel off, stop the cooking process. Remove all of the Pili from the water.  Remove the skins from the nuts.  Cooking the Pili Nuts Add vegetable oil to a clean saucepan.  Add the Pili nuts.  Fry the Pili nuts. Be sure to constantly stir the nuts while frying. Add sugar when the Pili nuts are golden brown.  Caramelize the sugar. Allow the caramelized sugar to coat the nuts. Remove the Pili nuts from the heat. Be sure they're coated in the caramelized sugar evenly and thoroughly! Finished.
